name: Pitfall
overview: A Vic20 conversion of the Atari 2600 game, designed by David Crane and released by Activision in 1982 The player controls Pitfall Harry and is tasked with collecting all the treasures in a jungle within 20 minutes. The world consists of screens which are horizontally connected in a flip screen manner. Each screen has one or more hazards: quicksand, tar pits, rolling logs, crocodiles, snakes, scorpions, campfires, and swinging vines.
